DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study : 1 . To examine within-day between-day test-retest reliability test protocol measure back hip muscle fatigability use EMG median frequency 2 . To examine immediate carry-over effect lumbopelvic manipulation EMG median frequency lumbar multifidus ( MULT ) , gluteus medius ( GMED ) gluteus maximus ( GMAX ) muscle patient chronic low back pain ( CLBP ) 3 . To compare fatigability level MULT , GMED GMAX muscle measure EMG median frequency participant receive lumbopelvic manipulation . The research hypotheses : 1 . The test protocol use EMG median frequency fatigue indicator MULT , GMED GMAX muscle good ( ICC ≥ 0.80 ) within-day between-day test-retest reliability . 2 . The fatigability level MULT , GMED GMAX muscle significantly decrease immediately lumbopelvic manipulation maintain two four day follow manipulation . 3 . The fatigability MULT , GMED GMAX muscle significantly decrease intervention manipulation group change occur placebo group .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Lumbopelvic Manipulation Neuromuscular Activity Back & Hip Muscles Adults With Chronic Low Back Pain
DOC.criteria: Healthy subject reliability phase : Subjects without history back problem Subjects without know pathology . Any serious spinal condition tumor , fracture , infection , Signs nerve root compression ( i.e . straight leg raise ≤ 45° diminished reflex , sensation lower extremity strength ) , Structural deformity , Spondylolithesis , Ankylosing spondylitis Spinal stenosis , Osteoporosis , Previous surgery back hip , Current pregnancy . Subjects Chronic low back pain reliability manipulation phase : Participants age 20 60 year . Have complaint chronic low back pain least three month . Any serious spinal condition tumor , fracture , infection , Signs nerve root compression ( i.e . straight leg raise ≤ 45° diminished reflex , sensation lower extremity strength ) , Structural deformity , Spondylolithesis , Ankylosing spondylitis Spinal stenosis , Osteoporosis , Previous surgery back hip , Current pregnancy
